iana.template_text:
MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Personal Tree - prs.plucker

Required parameters : None

Optional parameters : None

Encoding considerations : binary
This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of handling binary.

Security considerations : 
This format contains static data.  There are no known security issues with the format.

Interoperability considerations : 
The format is open and published.  The only widely available viewer for the format runs 
on PalmOS, but additional viewers for other platforms are in development.

Published specification : 
http://www.plkr.org/index.pl/cvs/docs/DBFormat.html?rev=HEAD

Applications which use this media : 
Plucker viewers and parsers display and create documents in this format 
(see http://www.plkr.org/).

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : 60	string		DataPlkr	Plucker document
2. File extension(s) : N/A
3. Macintosh file type code : N/A
4. Object Identifiers: N/A

The Plucker document format supports a single-file multi-page (in the
Web sense of 'page') hyperlinked information structure containing both
'rich' text and images. Links must be internal to the document, though
external links, in standard URL form, may be included and displayed,
but not followed. Images may either be embedded in a text page, as
with HTML, or be included as separate stand-alone pages.

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Bill Janssen
2. Email : bill&janssen.org

Intended usage : Common 

Author/Change controller : Bill Janssen <bill&janssen.org>         

(created 2002-24-02)

[]
